title: Eloquent: Stuttering Treatment
description:
Eloquent provides a guided speech therapy program for stuttering (also called stammering) to help you improve your fluency and develop a confident approach towards speaking.

Using the app, you will be able to:

* Learn various fluency shaping and stuttering modification techniques and practice them without leaving the app.

* Master these techniques by speaking to virtual avatars in various simulations.

* Transfer your skills to the real world through tasks which you complete outside the app.

* Understand your stuttering better and identify your core and secondary behaviors.

* Use Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) to address social anxiety, recognize unhelpful thoughts and foster a positive mindset towards communication.

* Track your progress through assessments and quick mood checks. Analyze the ups and downs of your fluency phases on a dashboard. Identify the triggers for your bad phases and learn to manage them better.

* Set daily reminders to keep you motivated and engaged so you don’t miss practice.

Download Eloquent: Your journey towards confident communication starts today!

summary: Gain fluency and develop a confident approach towards speaking
